description:
Variation of (Condition 2) of approved planning permission 1790/15:
- Basement ramp replaced with car lift
- Basement stairs to rear garden reconfigured and relocated.
- Basement light wells reconfigured
- Car lift's Plant Room a storage located within footprint of approved building
- Proposed internal stairs to Basement
- Basement floor lowered by 200mm
- Additional step added to top of Basement stairs
- Ground Floor stairs to rear garden reconfigured
- Ground Floor corridor to side entry widened to 1100mm and reconfigured
- Chinmey to Ground Floor Dining Room omitted from scheme. Also First Floor Bedroom 2 and Second Floor Bedroom 4
- First Floor internal layout part reconfigured
- Second Floor internal walls part removed
- Second Floor void infilled to form additional floor area to Bedroom 4
- Window designs revised to Front Elevation
- Window designs revised to Rear Elevation
- Window designs revised to Side Elevation
- Ground floor level lowered by 3 steps (450mm). Roof level remains as approved Planning Permission 1790/16
Variation of (Condition 3) of 1790/15: To exclude from 'commencement' - demolition, site preparation and ground work
Variation of (Condition 4) of 1790/15: To exclude from 'commencement' - demolition, site preparation and ground work
Variation of (Condition 5) of 1790/15: To exclude from 'commencement' - demolition, site preparation and ground work
Variation of (Condition 6) of 1790/15: To exclude from 'commencement' - demolition, site preparation and ground work
